title: Organic salmon and brassicas
description: Salmon cooked slowly in a fragrant oil is matched with elegant brassica accompaniments. Any brassica leftovers can be frozen and used another time.
ingredients: 4 spears purple sprouting broccoli, blanched and roasted
2 heads broccoli, stems removed and broken into florets
½ red cabbage, juiced, to yield 250g cabbage juice
